steam-deck.title: Steam Deck
intro: Steam Deck is best treated as a PC handheld: your PC library, portable form factor.
On the move, prioritise games with short runs, clear UI, and good controller support.

switch.title: Nintendo Switch (and Switch 2)
intro: Switch is handheld-first and low-friction: instant sleep/resume and consistent controls.
Switch 2 is treated under the Switch umbrella unless we later add a platform family model.
